arts.ttl: FC Salzburg 0-3 Real Madrid: Player Ratings as Los Blancos Make the Knock Stage of the Club World Cup
arts.sum: Real Madrid took care of business at Lincoln Financial Field, beating FC Salzburg 3-0 to book their place in the Round of 16 of the Club World Cup. Goals from Vinicius Jr. and Fede Valverde late in the first half put the Spanish team in control of the game, with Gonzalo Garcia doing another late in the second half. The Spaniard played three center-backs, with Aurelien Tchouameni playing alongside Dean Huijsen and Antonio Rudiger.

arts.ttl: Transcript: Xabi Alonso’s Post-Match Press Conference After FC Salzburg vs Real Madrid in Club World Cup
arts.sum: Real Madrid recorded a 3-0 win in their final Club World Cup group stage game, beating Austrian side FC Salzburg. Alonso: Vini Jr. had a great game.

arts.ttl: Real Madrid possible starting XI against Salzburg in the Club World Cup
arts.sum: In that case, Tchouaméni would drop into central defense, Valverde would play as the pivot, Güler would shift into midfield, and the right wing would open up — likely for Rodrygo. Courtois; Trent, Rüdiger, Huijsen, Fran García; Valverde, Tchouaméni, Bellingham; Güler, Gonzalo, and Vinicius.

arts.ttl: Official: 2 miss out as Real Madrid name squad to face RB Salzburg
arts.sum: La Liga giants Real Madrid have unveiled their squad for the club’s next outing at the Club World Cup. And it features, as expected, a number of noteworthy absentees. Real…

arts.ttl: RB Salzburg vs Real Madrid: Predicted Lineup for Club World Cup Clash
arts.sum: Despite making his return to team training this week after missing Madrid's first two games through illness, Kylian Mbappé is still unavailable for his coach, while Raul Asencio who received a red card against Pachuca is suspended. Real Madrid continue their FIFA Club World Cup campaign as they face Austrian side RB Salzburg in their third and final group game, and Xabi Alonso will have tough choices to make regarding his starting lineup.

arts.ttl: FC Salzburg Head Coach Fires Warning to Xabi Alonso and Real Madrid
arts.sum: Despite Xabi Alonso's team being heavy favorites, Letsch issued a warning to his team's opponents, which any coach would do when heading into an important game. However, head coach Thomas Letsch has come out fighting in his press conference ahead of Thursday's game.

arts.ttl: Real Madrid Confirm Kylian Mbappe Decision for Salzburg Club World Cup Game
arts.sum: Kylian Mbappé has been left out of the Real Madrid squad for the final Club World Cup group game against Red Bull Salzburg. Madrid are not yet assured of their spot in the knockout stages after drawing their opening match against Al Hilal, but Alonso’s side are in control of their own destinies, sitting top of the group heading into the final round of fixtures.

arts.ttl: FC Salzburg vs Real Madrid: Odds and Prediction
arts.sum: Real Madrid take on FC Salzburg in the final game of Group H, with the winner assured of progressing in first place. For Salzburg, a draw would put them in a challenging position, requiring the other game to finish in a draw or for the Saudi team to win by only one goal, as well as other factors coming into play.
